TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit BuildWarningEventArgs extends Microsoft.Build.Framework.LazyFormattedBuildEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 警告： 没有实现 ISerializable 有一定的序列化协定--它是永远不会更改该类型的一个承诺即字段类型标记某个类型 [Serializable] 不可变;在下一步版本类型中添加新字段，而没有遵循某些特殊的 FX 准则，可以中断向前和向后兼容性WARNING: marking a type [Serializable] without implementing ISerializable imposes a serialization contract -- it is a promise to never change the type's fields i.e. the type is immutable; adding new fields in the next version of the type without following certain special FX guidelines, can break both forward and backward compatibility ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何编写基本记录器对应生成事件。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]
